content.question: Which of the following is the harmonic series?

choices.label: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to 20, of, the fraction 1 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mo>∑</mo><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over 2 n, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, negative 1, close parenthesis, raised to the n plus 1, power, and denominator n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the sum, from n equals 1, to infinity, of, the fraction 1 over n" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mrow><munderover><mrow><mo>∑</mo></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>∞</mi></mrow></munderover><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>n</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test to apply.
